location_short_descr: Home-made fresh pasta to die for!
location_long_descr: This restaurant offers traditional italian dishes and fresh pasta prepared right in front of your eyes. Stay for a meal or watch the process of pasta-making, you-re sure to experience authentic italian cuisine
details: Via della Pelliccia, 12, 00153 Roma RM, Italy
Average 12 euro for a pasta dish
Short walk from Basiliek Van Santa Maria in Trastevere
